column4: Can anyone help me figure out how to get my images working on my homepage here http://ablemagazine.co.uk/ ? This is what is says on the place I downloaded the theme. I can't find any other information and the theme author won't answer my emails.[Insert image in a post/page using Custom Field. In the Excerpt mode (see example in the homepage) it shows a thumbnail size, in posts page it shows a full size image.]. I've tried check
Could be anything.. But, not related to Ubuntu at all
Either way. you can do it by scripting
you could also use awk maybe
you'd have to google it.. if you think you might need it often, it could even be worth learning Bash scripting
You could also code something quickly in php / Perl.. it doesn't take too long
If you know how to use Perl, or even PHP, you could code it in that
or grep.. I have no idea.. I'd have to look at it lol
easiest way.. Just use a GUI tool..
I need to uninvite 1,000 people from a facebook page; is there a macro application for ubuntu? (I need to click the X with my mouse and then hit enter to delete 1 person)
Not the right channel.. but, why not just delete the page?
Lots of info on it. Looking for a macro program that'll run on ubuntu, cant find anything online
